# Economic Activity

## 1. Average Household Income

**Statistical Test**: Two-sample Paired t-Test

**Hypothesis Testing**:

-   $H_{0}$: There were no changes in the average household income before and after Renewvia's mini-grid installation

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
-   $H_{1}$: There were a change in the average household income before and after Renewvia's mini-grid installation

```{r}
hist(df$avg_household_income_pre)
hist(df$avg_household_income_post)
```

```{r}
# Paired t-test
income_before <- df$avg_household_income_pre
income_after <- df$avg_household_income_post
t.test(x = income_before, y = income_after, 
       paired = TRUE)
```

## 2. Light Hours

**Statistical Test**: Two-sample Paired t-Test

**Hypothesis Testing**:

-   $H_{0}$: There were no changes in the number of light hours before and after Renewvia's mini-grid installation

```{=html}
<!-- -->
```
-   $H_{1}$: There were a change in the number of light hours before and after Renewvia's mini-grid installation

```{r}
# Paired t-test
light_hours_before <- df$light_hours_current_pre
light_hours_after <- df$light_hours_current_post
t.test(x = light_hours_before, 
       y = light_hours_after, 
       paired = TRUE)
```
